services.title: Our Modalities
services.subtitle: Traditional healing methods backed by modern science

featured.title: Acupuncture
featured.subtitle: Restore balance and stimulate healing
featured.shortDescription: Our primary treatment modality using fine needles to restore balance and promote healing
featured.fullDescription: Acupuncture involves the insertion of fine, sterile needles at specific points to restore the flow of Qi. This ancient practice stimulates natural healing, reduces pain, and promotes overall wellness.

services.title: Chinese Herbal Medicine
services.subtitle: Nature's pharmacy for holistic healing
services.shortDescription: Custom herbal formulas tailored to your needs
services.fullDescription: Chinese herbal medicine uses natural plant-based remedies, carefully combined in traditional formulas, to address the root causes of health concerns. Each formula is customized to your unique constitution and current health needs.

services.title: Cupping Therapy
services.subtitle: Release tension and promote circulation
services.shortDescription: Release muscle tension and improve circulation
services.fullDescription: Cupping therapy uses glass or silicone cups to create suction on the skin, promoting blood flow, releasing muscle tension, and drawing out toxins. This technique has been used for thousands of years to treat pain and improve circulation.

services.title: Moxibustion
services.subtitle: Warming therapy to invigorate Qi
services.shortDescription: Warm therapy to strengthen and energize
services.fullDescription: Moxibustion involves burning dried mugwort (moxa) near acupuncture points to warm the meridians, strengthen Qi, and promote healing. The gentle heat penetrates deeply to nourish and invigorate the body.

services.title: Tui Na Massage
services.subtitle: Therapeutic massage along meridians
services.fullDescription: Tui Na is a form of Chinese therapeutic massage that uses rhythmic compression, stretching, and manipulation techniques along the body's meridian channels. It combines massage with acupressure to restore balance and relieve pain.

services.title: Gua Sha
services.subtitle: Scraping therapy to release stagnation
services.shortDescription: Scraping therapy for pain and inflammation
services.fullDescription: Gua Sha involves using a smooth-edged tool to gently scrape the skin, promoting blood flow and releasing stagnation. This technique is particularly effective for releasing muscle tension and supporting recovery.
